Package data.scripts.bounty

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ActiveBounty
    Represents a bounty that has been at least viewed by the player.
    MagicBountyBarEvent
    Displays the bounty board and all associated bounties.
    MagicBountyBattleListener
    Ends bounties based on battle results.
    MagicBountyCampaignPlugin
    Tells the game engine to use MagicBountyFleetInteractionDialogPlugin for battles with bounty fleets.
    MagicBountyCoordinator
    The point of entry into MagicBounty scripting.
    MagicBountyData  
    MagicBountyData.bountyData
    The code representation of a bounty json definition.
    MagicBountyFleetEncounterContext  
    MagicBountyFleetInteractionDialogPlugin  
    MagicBountyIntel
    Displays MagicLib Bounties to the player.
